claims_summary: Search monopoly with 90%+ market share, NSA PRISM program participant, In-Q-Tel/CIA connections via Keyhole acquisition, Pentagon AI contracts, unprecedented mass data collection and surveillance infrastructure

nsa_prism_access: Snowden documents (2013): PRISM program slides show Google participation
Direct server access to user communications (emails, searches, files)
Google initial denial, later admitted legal compliance with orders
Ongoing NSA access via classified legal framework (FISA orders)
National Security Letters prevent disclosure of many data requests
cia_intelligence_connections: Early Google funding from CIA/NSA-connected venture capital (documented)
Keyhole Inc. acquisition (2004): In-Q-Tel portfolio company → Google Earth
In-Q-Tel press releases confirm CIA investment in Keyhole
Google Earth military and intelligence applications
Regina Dugan: DARPA director → Google VP → Facebook (revolving door)
pentagon_contracts: Project Maven (2017): AI for drone targeting, $9M initial contract
Internal Google documents leaked showing contract details
4,000+ employee petition against military AI work
Contract canceled 2018 after employee protests and resignations
Google Cloud pursuit of Joint Enterprise Defense Infrastructure (JEDI) contract
data_collection_scale: Search: 90%+ global market share, billions of queries daily
Gmail: 1.8+ billion users, email content scanning
Android: 70%+ mobile OS market share, location/communications access
YouTube: 2+ billion users, viewing history and preferences
Chrome browser: 65%+ market share, browsing history access
Comprehensive user profiles: Search + email + location + video + browsing
censorship_coordination: YouTube content removal: COVID-19 'misinformation,' vaccine skepticism
Search results manipulation: Algorithmic changes favor establishment sources
Coordination with government: Content moderation aligned with official narratives
Project Veritas videos: Google executives discussing manipulation
Transparency reports show government content removal requests

validation_status: Extensively documented through Snowden leaks, internal Google documents, congressional testimony, SEC filings, investigative journalism - classified programs remain partially concealed
